body: Where has she hiding a RPG at?

I love Mikami Cannon, and I can't wait to see this series completed. However the only 'new' chapter that hasn't already been released solo is the 6th one, the ero-novel role players, running from pages 96-113. As for all those vanilla lovers out there, here's the breakdown. Story 1 is basically wife sharing to overcome impotence, ending in happy MMF 3-way. Story 2 is super gross sexual exploitation of idols by ugly executives. Story 3 is a girl sharing her boyfriend with her BFF as a birthday gift, and it's super hot. Story 4 is a milf cheating with a young infatuated stud, but she's also the hottest thing this side of Mitarashi Kousei's take on Akiko-san. Story 5 is an ugly bastard talking his GF into one last fuck with the intent to keep her in the relationship, but thankfully it fails. Story 6 is an awkward mixer that ends in super hot ero-novel based roleplaying. Story 7 is one of the sweetest one-off true love stories that ends on an excellent funny note.
I've been waiting for this to be continued for a while now. Alas, it isn't complete yet but it'll get there. Just have to keep waiting...
